alert.note: Alert for St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Croix County through 545 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 6 miles east of New Richmond, or 21 miles northeast of River Falls, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenwood City. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
